name: txt_fordor
desc: FOR DOR: When a FOR DOR and NED KEE unit move into each other or are on each other, they are both destroyed.

name: txt_&
desc: &: Joins multiple conditions, subjects or objects together in a rule. Can also be spelled as ampersand with letters. Rules with stacked text and &s don't work like in baba, be sure to experiment!

name: txt_noswim
desc: NO SWIM: At end of turn, if a NO SWIM unit is touching another object, all objects on the tile are destroyed.

name: txt_got
desc: GOT (Verb): Causes the subject to drop the object when destroyed.

name: txt_colrful
desc: COLRFUL: Causes the unit to appear a variety of colours.

name: txt_rave
desc: RAVE: Causes the unit to flash through the rainbow extremely quickly.

name: txt_reed
desc: REED: Causes the unit to appear red. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_orang
desc: ORANG: Causes the unit to appear orange. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_yello
desc: YELLO: Causes the unit to appear yellow. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_grun
desc: GRUN: Causes the unit to appear green. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_cyeann
desc: CYEANN: Causes the unit to appear cyan. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_bleu
desc: BLEU: Causes the unit to appear blue. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_purp
desc: PURP: Causes the unit to appear purple. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_pinc
desc: PINC: Causes the unit to appear pink. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_whit
desc: WHIT: Causes the unit to appear white. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_graey
desc: GRAEY: Causes the unit to appear grey or gray. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.

name: txt_blacc

desc: BRWN: Causes the unit to appear brown. Persistent and can be used as a prefix condition.
